body: This guidance will tell you how to get money off your [court or tribunal fees](https://www.gov.uk/court-fees-what-they-are) if you have little or no savings, are on certain benefits or have a low income.
heading: Get help paying court or tribunal fees
lede: Find out [how to get help with court and tribunal fees](https://www.gov.uk/get-help-with-court-fees), including how to check if you're eligible to apply.
